item.title: Find
item.description: Getting started Usage 1 $ find [path...] [options] [expression] Wildcard 1 2 3 $ find . -name "*.txt" $ find . -name "2020*.csv" $ find . -name "json_*" Regex reference (quickref.me) Find cheatsheet (gist.github.com) Option Examples Option Example Description -type find . -type d Find only directories -name find . -type f -name “*.
